experience.blurb: Lululemon Studio, formerly Mirror, is a digital fitness company, running a subscription model on a digital mirror.
points: Worked on the API tying together the admin site, ecomm, mobile apps, and the Mirror
Improved Docker optimization
Led a cross-functional team to enhance/rebuild music integration on the Mirror

experience.blurb: Zipari builds a suite of tools designed to help organize and streamline health insurance, from purchasing to support.
points: Built and maintained an API used to sell insurance policies
Designed generic features that could be extended to fit specific clients needs
Integrated with client APIs to retrieve and send data

experience.blurb: Komodo Health is working to build the most complete healthcare map in the US, using various data sources and standardizing them for easier searching and data analysis.
points: Worked on a team turning an internal data search tool into an external product
Wrote specs for features and structured code alongside the product manager and team lead
Recommend best coding practices to help two solo engineers build out better as a team

experience.blurb: Clover Health is a Medicare insurance company that utilizes member data to help predict health futures to improve outcomes.
points: Built a system to receive and process messages from a remote system, including error checking and monitoring
Worked on a microservice to track the state of all members in all programs at Clover
Created and configured  servers and databases for the program microservice, including a bash script to deploy code
Setup code standards with Black and isort

experience.blurb: Marvel is a leading character-based entertainment company, developing comics, books, movies, games, and other media.
points: Worked with DevOps to update server standards; built a Squid proxy to bump TLS1.0 requests to TLS1.2
Maintained an OAuth system used to authenticate third party systems
Advised the team working on the Marvel site redesign on API design, Lumen, and security

experience.blurb: Forbes Media is a print and digital publishing company with international readers and writers.
points: Lead developer for Forbes’ Wordpress CMS and Falcon CMS
Set PHP coding standards, code reviews, and SASS/Grunt automation
Worked on architecture for a new, in-house CMS
Helped with interviews and communication with other department heads/overseeing project meetings when the HoD was unavailable

projects.title: Gamers' Plane
projects.blurb: Gamers’ Plane is a website that runs on a PHP API drawing from a MySQL and MongoDB database, feeding an AngularJS frontend. It’s currently being refactored to use FastAPI and NextJS frontend, adding a Redis cache, powered by Docker. It is a solo project, in which I do development, design, marketing, etc, and averages about 500 users a day.
